comment: [ENG] I am excited to announce a new partnership between FPT University Can Tho and Me. This collaboration will focus on several key areas: 1. Industry-academia collaboration between Taiwanese and Vietnamese businesses: We will facilitate partnerships between Taiwanese and Vietnamese businesses to promote industry-academia collaboration. This will involve connecting businesses with universities and research institutions to share knowledge and resources, and to develop joint projects and training programs. 2. Mentorship for student entrepreneurs: We will provide mentorship and support to student entrepreneurs at FPT University Can Tho. This will involve providing guidance on business development, fundraising, and market entry strategies. We will also connect students with potential investors and partners. 3. Internship and market expansion opportunities for Taiwanese businesses: We will connect Taiwanese businesses with internship and market expansion opportunities in Vietnam. This will involve helping businesses find qualified interns and employees, and identifying potential partners and customers in Vietnam. ‚ñ∫ I would like to express my gratitude to Vice President Mr. Bay for his strong support of this partnership. I share his vision of providing students with opportunities to learn and work in an international environment, and to develop their skills in multiple domains. I would also like to thank Mr. Luan , a long-time friend, for his instrumental role in bringing this partnership to fruition. ‚ñ∫ In the spirit of collaboration, we are inviting several Taiwanese organizations and schools to join us in this partnership. We will provide the necessary resources to support our students and partners in achieving their goals. This partnership is not only about providing opportunities for students to learn and work in an international environment, but also about helping more Taiwanese businesses succeed in the Vietnamese market. ‚ñ∫ Taiwanese businesses can collaborate with FPT University Can Tho and local businesses on research and technology transfer projects. They can also participate in entrepreneurship programs and competitions organized by FPT University. I encourage everyone to join us in this exciting collaboration. Please contact me if you are interested in learning more.

comment: The school is beautiful but the security guard hates it. If the shipper doesn't deliver the goods, people will slowly turn around and chase them away. The security guard needs to be retrained. If you leave the sign inside, the two-wheeled vehicle will stop there and the shipper will run up to the sign and not let you chase you.

comment: FPT University has a modern learning environment and practical training programs, helping students develop professional and soft skills. Good facilities, many useful extracurricular activities, but tuition is quite high.

comment: The campus is quite large, modern looking, suitable for those who are passionate about learning in the field of technology. Located near the center so convenient to travel.

comment: The environment is suitable for studying, exercising and sports activities. Many amenities suitable for students. A place worth considering for those who are or are about to finish high school. Quality instructors help students develop comprehensively. Technology is quite modern.

comment: [Evaluating only the facilities] The school is incredibly beautiful, very clean, has modern architecture, the feeling of the school is like being in a foreign country, the students are very friendly, funny and enthusiastic, the canteen is beautiful, the food is reasonably priced and delicious.

comment: 1. Tuition for the main program  Number of semesters: 9 semesters (including internship period at the enterprise).  Study duration per semester: 4 months.  Tuition for language majors: 13,500,000 VND/semester, payable at the beginning of each semester.  Tuition for economics majors: 13,500,000 VND/semester, payable at the beginning of each semester.  Tuition for information technology majors: 16,500,000 VND/semester, payable at the beginning of each semester.  2.  Tuition for the English Foundation Program  For students who do not have enough English proficiency equivalent to TOEFL iBT 80 or IELTS (Academic) 6.0 or equivalent conversion. Students who already have official certificates according to the above standards are exempt from this program. Other students are assigned to study levels corresponding to their level through a placement test at the beginning of the course held before the opening ceremony in September 2018. Students need to reach the highest level of English before starting the main program.  Maximum number of learning levels: 6 levels  Study duration for each level: 2 months.  Tuition: 6,750,000 VND/level  3. Fees need to be paid upon admission  The first installment of tuition payment upon admission to the school will temporarily collect the following amounts: (1) + (2)  including:  (1)   Admission registration fee: 3,000,000 VND.  (2)   First AV level tuition: 6,750,000 VND  1. Course fees  Number of semesters: 9 semesters (including internships at enterprises).  Duration of each semester: 4 months.  Specialized language tuition: 13,500,000 VND / semester, payable at the beginning of each semester.  Tuition of economic majors: 13,500,000VND / semester, submitted at the beginning of each semester.  Information technology course fees: VND 16,500,000 / semester, payable at the beginning of each semester.  2. Tuition fees for the English Foundation Program  For students who do not yet have English proficiency equivalent to the TOEFL iBT 80 or IELTS (Academic) 6.0 or equivalent.  Students who already have official certificates according to the above criteria are exempt from this program.  Other students are categorized into levels that correspond to their level through the first placement test held before the entrance ceremony in September 2018. Students need to achieve the highest level of English before starting the mainstream program.  Maximum number of levels: 6 levels  Duration of each level: 2 months.  Tuition: 6,750,000 VND / level  3. Fees to be paid upon admission  The first installment of tuition payment at the time of admission is: (1) + (2), including:  (1) Registration fee: VND 3,000,000.  (2) The first AV tuition fee: VND 6,750,000
